FuncDef: The reset bfd statistics command clears statistics about packets received and sent for BFD sessions. The reset bfd statistics command clears statistics about packets received and sent for BFD sessions.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about packets received and sent for all BFD sessions.
-

Clears statistics about packets received and sent for the BFD sessions with a specified discriminator.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about packets received and sent for the BFD sessions, run reset bfd statistics command with one of the following parameters:
